mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.name AS "name", a.open_id AS "openId", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.sex AS "sex", a.country AS "country", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.head_img AS "headImg", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dk_install_person a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.mobile LIKE '%'||#{mobile}||'%' '%'+#{mobile}+'%' concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dk_install_person( id, mobile, name, open_id, nick_name, sex, country, province, city, head_img, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mobile}, #{name}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{sex}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{headImg}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dk_install_person SET mobile = #{mobile}, name = #{name}, open_id = #{openId}, nick_name = #{nickName}, sex = #{sex}, country = #{country}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, head_img = #{headImg}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
